title: Health benefits of moderate drinking may be overstated, study finds

title_detail.value: Health benefits of moderate drinking may be overstated, study finds

summary: The benefits of light alcohol consumption, as well as the risks associated with not drinking at all, might not be as great as previously thought, according to researchers who examined the drinking habits of middle-aged adults.

summary_detail.value: The benefits of light alcohol consumption, as well as the risks associated with not drinking at all, might not be as great as previously thought, according to researchers who examined the drinking habits of middle-aged adults.
